title: Ticket #3908: Spurious warnings from VM universe submit?
description:
I submit my VM universe job with the following attributes (among others): 

should_transfer_files   = YES
when_to_transfer_output = ON_EXIT
transfer_input_files    = http://submit-1.chtc.wisc.edu/SQUID/cat/cat-base-sl64-amd64-htcondor.dsk,cat-user-disk.raw
transfer_output_files   = cat-user-disk.raw
transfer_output_remaps  = "cat-user-disk.raw = output-disk-$(CLUSTER).$(PROCESS).raw"

When I submit, I get the following warnings: 

WARNING: the line `when_to_transfer_output = ON_EXIT' was unused by condor_submit. Is it a typo?
WARNING: the line `should_transfer_files = YES' was unused by condor_submit. Is it a typo?

I believe that both attributes are having their desired effect, despite the warnings. Files certainly are transferred, at least.
remarks:
2014-Jul-30 15:15:04 by cat:
I think that this got fixed a long time ago. Could someone verify, and if so, close?
creator: cat
